s.text: Researchers for the New Zealand Antarctic Program had found that male Adelie penguins on Ross Island, 800 miles from the South Pole, "pay for sexual favours with rocks and stones, a limited resource that can prove crucial for the survival of broods."
Annan is entitled now to have the US pay up its accumulated arrears to the world body."
